2020.title: Founded STARAJIN
2020.desc: Advisor for Wellness Tourism Cluster Project. India business development for Specialty Chemical company in Korea. KOFICE Local Culture international Exchange project operation for art group Damso in Haenam.

2021.title: Strategic Partnerships
2021.desc: MOU with G2B consulting firm THEISTIC. Advisory for Gwangju FEZ regarding Automotive & IT Manpower exchange. India Marketing & Promotion for R&F Chemical <Magic Copper Mask>.

2022.title: Business Expansion
2022.desc: Technology Commercialization & Biz Development for Waste to Energy project. India business official partner for K-Culture Center in Gwangju city. Official marketing partner of Maison India Travels and Books. MOU with India government PR agency MMJP Media.

2023.title: Project Leadership
2023.desc: Korea Partner for Waste management pilot project of 9 state of India. India-Korea Artist Camp Advisor for Namjisland Culture and education group. Selected for Media Startup Supporting Project by Korea Press Foundation.

2024.title: Innovation & Growth
2024.desc: Korea-India Business matching platform 'Konnectin' Launching. MOU with India Specialty Chemical Manufacturer Association. MOU with India Startup Association 'WeSpark'. MOU with Law & Regulation consulting company Milano Consultants. MOU with VERYWORDS, Korea's Climate Platform with EV.

solutions.title: Core Business Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Strategic consulting that transforms your vision into Korean market success
solutions.description1: At StaraJIN, we believe that successful market entry starts with deep understanding and strategic action. Our consulting services are designed to provide comprehensive market insights, tailored strategies, and proven methodologies to help you establish a strong presence in the Korean market.
solutions.description2: Whether you're looking to expand your business operations, establish partnerships, or navigate regulatory requirements, we're here to guide you through every step of your Korean market journey.
focusAreas: Enabling your business to penetrate the Indian market successfully
Offering strategy, procurement, collaboration, and acquisition proposal consultation for the sustainable growth of your company
